mapper.insert: /*insertWashInfo*/ insert into iw_wash_info( corp_name, sido, sigungu, corp_type, wash_type, address, tel_no, latitude, longitude, reg_dt )values( #{corpName}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{corpType}, #{washType}, #{address}, #{telNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, now() )
mapper.select: /*selectGroupBySido*/ SELECT sido FROM iw_wash_info GROUP BY sido
/*selectGroupBySiGunGu*/ SELECT sigungu FROM iw_wash_info where sido = #{sido} GROUP BY sigungu

/*selectInfoWashList*/ SELECT iw_seq as iwSeq, corp_name as corpName, sido, sigungu, corp_type as corpType, wash_type as washType, address, tel_no as telNo, latitude, longitude FROM iw_wash_info where sido = #{sido} and sigungu = #{sigungu} LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
